attributes.action: Restrict the amount spent on Election Campaigns by Publicly Funding them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would provide a limited amount of funding per party and per candidate.  This funding  would come from the Treasury and would be fully, publicly accounted for.  Once it was gone, it would be gone and nothing more may be spent on that Election campaign.  There would be a lump sum for each party and a smaller amount per candidate fielded in the Election.  By Elections would be handled in the same way but the amount spent would be reduced.  The amounts to be allocated would require a referendum.
